tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have a lot of stories to tell about my doctor Tushita Singh and my experiences with her.. She is such a cool as well as a disciplined person who take care of her patient with friendly gestures AND strictly warn them when they did something wrong or harmful to themselves during the treatment. For instance, I am a dancer and I have broken atleast 4-5 ceramic braces of my set till now because of different reasons every time. Accordingly she should have scolded me.. But she acted very calmy which I really didn't expected at any way. And latest, when I visited her with an unknowingly broken brace... She laughed and asked me that where you had fallen? ... Your two braces have broken. I was shocked.. Because I didn't felt their breaking..and then she told me to chill... As it is ok to happen with patients and I got relief! Such incidents are quite so little but means a lot for a doctor and her patient bond because these little things effect the treatment too i.e the most important part between them. One more thing, before my treatment got started, I was really very scared for having braces kind of thing... But she explained me the whole procedure so well that I got convinced to have them. I also visited 2-3 dentists before visiting her..,they infact didn't explained me in such a way that Dr. Tushita did to me. So, that's why I decided to hand over the responsibility of my smile to her. I have my teeth problems since childhood.. I am that kid who has visited dentist in every 2-3 months .. So for me.. I have had experiences with many dentists *** * *** *** **** *** ******* ***** ** *** **** ***** *** ** **** ******* I don't have to visit any other dentist after her and her fantastic treatment!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Being treated by Dr Tushita and Dr Mahima at Family Dental is probably my best dental experience so far and let me add that I’ve had far too many visits to the dentist since childhood.

I had a severe case of overcrowding and deep bite which made chewing difficult and looked awful. I opted for the Invisalign route for my treatment and the results achieved within just 6 months are phenomenal.

They were quick to respond to my queries and guided me through the nitty gritties of my treatment with the help of accurate simulations.

Timings of my appointments were made very flexible which was especially important for me as my work kept me mostly out of station. They also kept monitoring my progress on phone and always reminded me of my upcoming sittings even if I forgot.(even after I had paid the treatment fees, which was also very nominal).

In addition to the above, seeing smiling warm faces who patiently hear out all your trivial queries is a departure from the stereotypical grumpy old impatient dentists with bad handwriting you may sometimes come across.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Invisible/Clear Braces,Ceramic Braces Fixing,Ceramic Braces,Metal Braces,Braces,
review: Family dental dwarka is our trusted neighbourhood dental clinic and highly praised by everyone in our society in sector 18 Dwarka. I took both my children here on a strong recommendation for braces treatment, Dr Tushita Singh is a trusted and experienced doctor and is now our household favourite dentist. The braces treatment has been affordable and smooth, appointments are always flexible and the doctor is always available on calls. My children are very happy with their smile transformation and we even received discounts for getting both the children treatment simultaneously. I would highly recommend Dr Tushita Singh and her team ** *** ** ********** *** **** ************ ** ****** **** *** ********** ****** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
context: Invisalign Orthodontics,Invisible/Clear Braces,Straightening Teeth (Conventional Braces),Straightening of teeth ( Invisalign ) - Removable option,Misaligned Teeth,
review: Dr Tushita Singh is a very professional,well read and well travelled doctor. She's friendly towards my elder daughter who got braces from her last year after reading her reviews online, meeting her gave us the confidence to even get our younger daughter treated from her in whom by timely intervention she even avoided braces treatment. She seems to be a very moral and ideal professional and I've heard my daughters mentioning her to their friends for treatment as well. We in dwarka sector 18 are very happy with her and suggest her to anyone looking for the best dentist in dwarka. We could say with confidence she's the most popular orthodontist in Delhi for sure. Go to her without a shadow of doubt for any dental concerns.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Getting my Invisalign treatment from Dr Tushita, I was attracted by her multiple reviews online and she was exactly the same in person, I'm very happy with my ongoing treatment. The doctor is friendly, the staff is well trained, the clinic is gorgeous and hygienic and one of the best in Dwarka. After breaking the payment into comfortable emi options, it's not a big load on my finances either. I would recommend Dr Tushita and Family dental for anyone who needs braces or Invisalign smile correction in Dwarka.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I was in a difficult spot with ending my Invisalign treatment after many delays due to the pandemic and my travel. Luckily I found this clinic at just the right time.
Dr. Tushita is a thorough professional and the most accommodating even when the patient can be “a bit” difficult at times, (I know as I was ;)). She takes into account her patient’s needs and wants in every decision and plans much ahead.

I also had the pleasure of having a chipped tooth rebuilt by Dr. Mahima and couldn’t believe the perfection of the end result.

Bottomline - you only get flawless execution and advise from Dr. Tushita and Dr. Mahima. Highly recommended for all sorts of dental procedures.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Invisalign Orthodontics,Invisible/Clear Braces,Straightening of teeth ( Invisalign ) - Removable option,
review: I am Purnima, I visited Dr Tushita Singh in Dwarka for Invisalign treatment. I was worried about the cost factor, the doctor gave me all options from lowest to highest, gave me a lot of brochures and pamphlets and told me to read as much as possible before making a decision. After I visited few websites, I saw her as a Gold Invisalign provider in Dwarka mentioned on all Invisalign websites and other brands too, it made me very confident and I decided to start my treatment with her. I had financial restrictions so I could not pay big amounts, she broke it down into easy EMI payment options for Invisalign treatment. I’m not midway through my treatment, seeing gap closure of teeth and even chewing has improved. I recommend Dr Tushita Singh for anyone seeking the best Orthodontist in Dwarka for braces or Invisalign treatment, I am completely satisfied with my experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Getting my treatment here has so far been a wonderful experience for me.
The clinic is hygienic and complies with all COVID guidelines.
Dr. Tushita is a friendly and professional doctor with a lot of expertise.
I went to the clinic to get my teeth straightened. She explained the issue with my teeth and recommended ceramic braces. She patiently and precisely explained the entire procedure. If I have any issues/concerns, I approach her and she kindly addresses them. All in all, I am really satisfied with my dental treatment and would highly recommend to anyone with dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
context: Metal Braces Fixing,Invisalign Orthodontics,Straightening Teeth (Conventional Braces),Invisible/Clear Braces,
review: Gaps in teeth bothered me, I was referred to Dr Tushita by my neighbour in Akshardham apartments, then I realised my whole building was visiting family dental only and it gave me more confidence.  The doctor is friendly and explaining all treatment options from cheapest to most expensive. I went back home and read about Invisalign and saw on the site that Dr Tushita is their premium gold Invisalign certified Doctor.  So I'm getting my Invisalign treatment in Dwarika by Dr Tushita and happy with results. Most gaps have already closed and treatment is followed up nicely.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Invisalign Orthodontics,Straightening of teeth ( Invisalign ) - Removable option,
review: I was referred to Dr Tushita by a colleague, as described she was friendly, professional as well as very patient. The gaps between my teeth have bothered me for a long time and I thought braces were only for children, she gave me the option of Invisalign which works for adults, they are removable invisible braces like contact lenses for teeth, she showed me a complete simulation of the finished treatment and I must say owing to her high ranking as a certified professional, I was given a great discount. Very happy with my Invisalign treatment with Dr Tushita and the best rates for Invisalign treatment in Gurgaon, I would recommend her to anyone looking for the same.

review: Visited Dr Tushita at family dental dwarka for braces consultation for my 2 daughters on my neighbour's recommendation. Was immediately convinced by her explanation of the issue and got metal braces for my younger daughter in school and Invisalign for my elder daughter in college. We paid later by online means, the doctor was not very particular about payments which we liked, she explained the issue well and was very concerned about follow ups and outcome of the treatment. We are very happy with our choice and I would like to recommend dr tushita and team for anyone looking to get the best braces treatment for their kids in dwarka and west delhi.

tags: Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Aesthetic Dentistry,Invisible/Clear Braces,Smile Design,Wedding Smile Planner,
review: In my top 10 to do list before my wedding,my smile designing was my biggest priority. My front teeth were jutting out and fractured at edges and i was very underconfident about smiling. Dr Tushita suggested Invisalign and fixed my teeth gaps first,i was surprised at how nicely they were aligned with just a few weeks of treatment. After that she did teeth whitening and gave me veneers for my front 2 broken teeth. I feel like a new person when i look in the mirror,my photos came out amazing and everyone complimented me and my bride equally. I really wish to thank Dr Tushita for her time, treatment planning and this outcome. I feel very confident and happy now. ** ******* ** *** **** ************ ** ******* you can to family dental,they actually treat you like family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Invisible/Clear Braces,Straightening Teeth (Conventional Braces),Invisible lingual braces ,
review: I visited for Invisible braces for myself and my sister. Dr Tushita is a certified Invisalign provider and we were very impressed with her reviews and a friend's recommendation about her. Her attitude and the level of her knowledge, her friendly nature and her ease of explaining everything matched our expectations perfectly. She understood it's an expensive treatment and told us to go home and read about it and think about it, we liked that she did not push us. Both of us have started our Invisalign treatment with Dr Tushita and we are extremely happy with our decision. We recommend her to anyone looking for this treatment in dwarka Or entire Delhi. Thank you Dr Tushita for a great treatment experience.

review: Since I fixed my wedding date I've been looking for a good dentist in delhi to fix my crooked teeth. My friend referred me to Dr Tushita Singh and I'm deeply impressed by her professional services, she asked me for my deadline and her follow up during our limited time was impeccable. I have referred her to 2 more friends since then, and very happy to say that my smile in the wedding photos were praised by one and all. Thank you Dr Tushita for giving my smile a new lease of life, ****** *** **** ******* ** ******

We have met all orthodontists in Dwarka,** *** ****** *** ***** *** **** ************ ** ****** *** *** **** ********** ******** ** ****** Don't think twice, you can trust this doctor.

review:
** ******* ** ****** * **** ******** I took my mother for her dental issues related to filling and similar problems. Dr Tushita explained the problems to my mother and my mother could understand well. There were follow up visits to do some fillings, size measurements etc. and my mother was really satisfied and happy with the treatment. 

Since I myself didn't take any treatment but I could feel that Dr Tushita explains the problems, implications related to procedures and then go for the treatment. Happened with us, seen with other patients too. Definitely a good qualified staff and very friendly I must say.

review: ** ******* ***** ** ******* * ***** *** **** ****** ********** ** ******. She made my teenage son comfortable within few minutes. She is very professional and explains the treatment in detail and her behavior is consistent at every visit. She is transparent about the costing and flexible and empathatic about payment options. I have referred all of my friends who's children need braces to her and i have heard things like she may be the best orthodontist in delhi. We are now friends in a personal capacity too and i would just say it is a delight to meet her everytime and i would recommend dr tushita to anyone who has any dental concerns in dwarka or anywhere in delhi NCR.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Tushita is a thorough professional and has a very friendly demeanour . She explained the problem and solution precisely and completed the treatment with sophistication and up to my satisfaction. In fact, the cosmetic arrangement did not fit in the first trial and she got them replaced within 4-5 days, without any additional charge as she herself was not satisfied, therefore displaying a satisfaction centric personality in the overall experience.
I wish her all the best as she has a long way to go..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hey im shresth bhardwaj, 
I want to share my experience with you all 
Before 1 year i have visited at dr tushita’s clinic she’s Always very friendly and helpful. Explains everything thoroughly too you and puts you at ease. I highly recommend to visit at dr tushita’s clinic. I have done with a braces treatment previously i was very much afraid that there’s so much pain in this treatment but ms tushita handeled it in such a nice way and it was a painless treatment. If I talk about my teeths shaping and all so yes there’s so much difference and it’s fixed in such a nice shape.
All creadit goes to ms tushita 
Really thank you so much

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I was too scared to go for surgical extraction of tooth, but as suggested and promised by Dr. Tushita it was painless, she made me feel comfortable throughout by continuously counselling me since I was scared. 
Special thanks to Dr. anuj, the surgeon who did the surgery, at every step he made sure that i am not in pain and also explained that how he will be taking me through the surgery, I think this is the first time I have had such a comfortable dental experience, while we all dread going to the dentist and being in the hot seat at the clinic. 
Last but not the least, I am allergic to meds, as basic as PCM but surprisingly all the meds that I was prescribed did not react at all, this was the best part!! 
Highly recommend to all I know, thank you Dr. Tushita and Dr. Anuj

review: Visited Dr Tushita at Family Dental Dwarka with my father for his multiple root canals and subsequent capping. The doctor was sweet and explained everything in detail. My father was comfortable and appointments were given at our convenience. Would recommend Dr Tushita Singh for pain free single sitting rct and good follow up and treatment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I'm undergoing an orthodontic treatment, i.e ceramic braces for severe crowding and alignment. Dr. Tushita very well explained as to which would be the best for me & how braces work. 
I got 4 of my teeth extracted & Dr. Mahima was very good with the whole teeth extraction process.
So far I've been seeing good results & I would highly recommend this place.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,

review: I was referred to Dr Tushita by a friend already undergoing treatment, as promised she was friendly,practical and understanding about payments,clear about treatment goals and expectations and mostly she was always readily available and flexible regarding appointments as I work late hours. Happy about starting my Invisalign treatment with Dr Tushita at Family Dental Dwarka, her experience speaks for itself.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Went for a consultation,saw an on going scan and coupled with Dr Tushitas explanation was easily convinced to get my own scan and start my treatment as well. I needed a root canal as well,which was performed by dr mahima who specialises in painless root canal. I have started my Invisalign treatment and can already see changes in my teeth, recieving lots of compliments. I would recommend dr tushita and dr mahima to anyone looking for Invisalign or braces in dwarka or delhi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife and I are getting Root canal treatment and capping and our neighbour suggested a dentist near me in Dwarka. The clinic is spacious and very conveniently placed on the ground floor of sector 11 main market with parking always available. These were issues always faced by us when looking for dentists, so i took my father as well as he cannot climb stairs. Dr Mahina is making his denture by replacing his missing teeth at a surprisingly affordable cost. Now Dr Tushita is starting metal braces treatment of my elder daughter all here in Dwarka. Both of them have filled the void of a good and dependable dental clinic in Dwarka and saved us the trouble of travelling to South Delhi

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We were referred to Dr. Tushita by our orthopedic for the treatment of our son. Initially we were hesitant because we are residing in noida. But once we met her she presented such a clear picture of the procedure including duration of the treatment that we started the treatment of metallic self ligating braces. We were satisfied with the treatment as the doctor has great knowledge and is very professional. She is very cooperative with the patients and values their time. She provides the EMI option also if the treatment is costly and lengthy. I would recommend you this clinic if you are looking for a good orthodontist.
